title: godoc: error message more easy to understand
body:
by **motoya.kurotsu**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. run godoc in server mode specifying non-exsistent index file. 
$ godoc --index=true -index_files='non-existent' -http=:6060

What is the expected output?
The error message which is more easy to understand, for example, such as 

  error reading index: no match file for `non-existent'

What do you see instead?

  error reading index: EOF

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

Which operating system are you using?
Fedora 17

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
1.0.3

Please provide any additional information below.

patch is attached to clarify the issue.
Attachments: 1. godoc.patch (594 bytes)
